info.title: mLocate
info.description: mLocation is an open API that can be used to lookup number location info. It is a hosted, secure, scalable solution that is developer friendly and can be easily integrated with your application. Just give any 10-digit Indian mobile number and get information such as network connection type, circle name and operator name using this API. Mobile number portability not supported as of now. Please get in touch with us if you would like to improve this api or need any additional information
